shài
dry in sun, expose to sun
сушить на солнце, выставлять на солнце
rtega_mnemonic:
曬曬RS
晒晒		䵘㬠dry in sun, expose to sun
  • dried in the beautiful and magnificent 麗 sun 日
  • when the sun 日 has reached the West 西 your stuff has been exposed and dried in the sun
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 麗 indicates the sound; 日 (sun) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 日 [ rì ] sun; day; daytime
    • 麗 [ lì ] beautiful, elegant, magnificent
heisig_chinese_memo: Basking in a lovely sun is a great way to relax.
Ru_trainchinese:
shài: (глаг) греться на солнце, загорать; (о солнце) светить на; не обращать внимания (на кого-л.) (晒 может также использоваться в традиционном написании)
shài: (глаг) публиковать в Интернете
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: In the Old West, basking in the sun was the only method for relaxing.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " day " to " li " sound. " Bath " means exposure, that is, exposure to sunlight. "Said Wen": "Sun, 㬥 also. Congri, Lisheng." "Dialect. Seventh": "Fruit and the like, it is called sun drying between the Qin and Jin Dynasties." And "Tenth": "Ban, sun, dry things. Yang Chu also speaks." Sunlight can make things dry, so " sun "It means to dry. In ancient books, for example, "Qi Min Yao Shu. Ringo Thirty-ninth": "When Ringo is red, it breaks, removes the child, heart, and stalk, and the sun makes it dry." Du Fu of the Tang Dynasty "Sitting Alone": "During the sun for the old age, the child is in the door."

" Sun " also means to irradiate and shine. Such as "Han Shu. "Jing Thirteen Biography": "The ministers heard the sunshine in the daytime, and the faint light shines." Han Yu of the Tang Dynasty "Chaogui": "The long wind blows the sky, and the autumn sun is thousands of miles.
humanum_short_description_en: From " day " to " li " sound. " Bath " means exposure, that is, exposure to sunlight.
humanum_full_description:
從「日」，「麗」聲。「曬」表示曝曬，即暴露在陽光的照射下。《說文》：「曬，㬥也。从日，麗聲。」《方言．第七》：「㬥五穀之類，秦晉之間謂之曬。」又〈第十〉：「昲、曬，乾物也。揚楚通語也。」陽光的照射能使物乾，故「曬」有曬乾的意思。古書中的用例如《齊民要術．柰林檎第三十九》：「林檎赤熟時，擘破，去子、心、蔕，日曬令乾。」唐代杜甫〈獨坐〉：「曬藥安垂老，應門試小童。」

　　「曬」也表示照射、照耀。如《漢書．景十三傳》：「臣聞白日曬光，幽隱皆照。」唐代韓愈〈朝歸〉：「長風吹天墟，秋日萬里曬。」
humanum_short_description: 從「日」，「麗」聲。「曬」表示曝曬，即暴露在陽光的照射下。

Chinese: Basking in a lovely sun is a great way to relax.
Meaning: bask
Hanzi: 晒
Story: In the Old West, basking in the sun was the only method for relaxing.
Kind: traditional

從「 日 」，「 麗 」聲。「 曬 」表示曝曬，即暴露在陽光的照射下。《說文》：「曬，㬥也。从日，麗聲。」《方言．第七》：「㬥五穀之類，秦晉之間謂之曬。」又〈第十〉：「昲、曬，乾物也。揚楚通語也。」陽光的照射能使物乾，故「 曬 」有曬乾的意思。古書中的用例如《齊民要術．柰林檎第三十九》：「林檎赤熟時，擘破，去子、心、蔕，日曬令乾。」唐代杜甫〈獨坐〉：「曬藥安垂老，應門試小童。」 「 曬 」也表示照射、照耀。如《漢書．景十三傳》：「臣聞白日曬光，幽隱皆照。」唐代韓愈〈朝歸〉：「長風吹天墟，秋日萬里曬。」

Seventh": "Fruit and the like, it is called sun drying between the Qin and Jin Dynasties." And "Tenth": "Ban, sun, dry things. Yang Chu also speaks." Sunlight can make things dry, so " sun"It means to dry. In ancient books, for example, "Qi Min Yao Shu. Ringo Thirty-ninth": "When Ringo is red, it breaks, removes the child, heart, and stalk, and the sun makes it dry." Du Fu of the Tang Dynasty "Sitting Alone": "During the sun for the old age, the child is in the door." " Sun" also means to irradiate and shine. Such as "Han Shu. "Jing Thirteen Biography": "The ministers heard the sunshine in the daytime, and the faint light shines." Han Yu of the Tang Dynasty "Chaogui": "The long wind blows the sky, and the autumn sun is thousands of miles.

曬字的基本解释

曬
shài
见“晒”。

曬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shài］
［《廣韻》所賣切，去卦，生。］
［《廣韻》所寄切，去寘，生。］
亦作“2”。“晒1”的繁体字。
(1)暴晒；晒干。
(2)放射；照耀。
(3)晾在外面，不理睬。
(4)犹煞。甚，极。

曬字的康熙字典解释

【辰集上】【日字部】　曬； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页501第44
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?所寄切，音躧。【說文】暴也。【前漢·中山靖王傳】臣聞白日曬光，幽隱皆照。【註】師古曰：曬，暴也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?所賣切，音?。【玉篇】暴乾物也。亦作䵘。　又【集韻】所嫁切，音嗄。義同。　又抽知切，音摛。舒也。

曬字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
曬字的起名意思

暂无。

[Sold in "Guangyun" cut, go to the hexagram, and give birth. ]

Also known as "2". Traditional characters for "晒1".
(1) Exposure to the sun; sun-dried.
(2) Radiation; irradiate.
(3) Leave it outside and ignore it.
(4) Yusha. Very, extremely.
